General.Name: Hennessy Capital Investment Corp VI
General.Description: Hennessy Capital Investment Corp. VI does not have significant operations. It intends to effect a merger, capital stock exchange, asset acquisition, stock purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses in the industrial technology sectors in the United States. Hennessy Capital Investment Corp. VI was incorporated in 2021 and is based in Zephyr Cove, Nevada.
